title: Lobbies slam telecoms reform plan for failing Draghi and Letta
summary_full: In a letter sent to the Commission president, obtained by Euractiv, GSMA and Connect Europe also warn about service risks from forced phase-out of Chinese suppliers
summary_public: In a letter sent to the Commission president, obtained by Euractiv, GSMA and Connect Europe also warn about service risks from forced phase-out of Chinese suppliers
